lead_paragraph: The trial was postponed until May after a federal judge granted a request from the state’s Republican leaders to wait for the Supreme Court to decide whether to hear a similar case from Virginia.

headline.print_headline: Trial Over a Transgender Law Is Delayed
headline.main: Trial Over North Carolina Law on Transgender Restroom Access Is Delayed

snippet: The trial was postponed until May after a federal judge granted a request from the state’s Republican leaders to wait for the Supreme Court to decide whether to hear a similar case from Virginia....
